title: Employee Work Hours Tracking System
description: A system to track employee work hours, including clock-in/clock-out, break management, overtime calculation, and reporting.

userStories.title: Employee Clock-In
userStories.description: As an employee, I want to clock in when I start my shift so that my work hours are recorded.
acceptanceCriteria: Employee can clock in with a single action
System records timestamp of clock-in
System prevents duplicate clock-ins without clock-out
Clock-in is associated with the employee's ID

userStories.title: Employee Clock-Out
userStories.description: As an employee, I want to clock out when I end my shift so that my total work hours are calculated.
acceptanceCriteria: Employee can clock out with a single action
System records timestamp of clock-out
System calculates total hours worked for the shift
System prevents clock-out without prior clock-in

userStories.title: Break Time Tracking
userStories.description: As an employee, I want to log my break times so that they are excluded from my total work hours.
acceptanceCriteria: Employee can start and end breaks
Break duration is calculated automatically
Break time is subtracted from total work hours
Multiple breaks per shift are supported

userStories.title: Overtime Calculation
userStories.description: As a manager, I want the system to automatically calculate overtime so that employees are compensated correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Hours over 8 per day are flagged as daily overtime
Hours over 40 per week are flagged as weekly overtime
Overtime rates are configurable
Overtime is displayed separately in reports

userStories.title: Employee Hours Report
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to view a report of employee work hours so that I can monitor attendance and productivity.
acceptanceCriteria: Report shows daily, weekly, and monthly summaries
Report includes regular hours, overtime, and breaks
Report can be filtered by employee and date range
Report can be exported to CSV

userStories.title: Manual Time Entry
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to manually add or edit time entries so that I can correct mistakes or add missed punches.
acceptanceCriteria: Manager can add time entries for any employee
Manager can edit existing time entries
All manual changes are logged with reason
Original entries are preserved for audit
